EmailTemplate.description: 你的餐單改變包括了價格上升 Your menu change contains Price MarkUp
EmailTemplate.name: FP MM Menu Change - Can’t be typed - Due to markup
EmailTemplate.subject: 你的餐單改變包括了價格上升 Your menu change contains Price MarkUp
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
親愛的合作餐廳：
你最近要求更改你的網上餐單，而我們發現該餐單之價格跟餐廳堂食價有所出入，所以煩請再次查看網上餐單，將最新價格傳送給我們，好讓我們作出更改。
有其他疑問？請電郵至 partner@foodpanda.hk 或致電 +852 5819 8997。我們樂意解答。
謝謝，
你的 foodpanda 合作餐廳服務小組
Dear Restaurant Partner,
You have recently requested a menu update for your online menu.
We have noticed however that the prices in the menu you sent us do not match the dine-in prices of your menu.
We would like to kindly request you that check again the online menu and send us the updated prices so that we can proceed with the changes you have requested.
Any questions? Feel free to contact us per E-Mail* partner@foodpanda.hk *or via phone under +852 5819 8997.
We are happy to help you!
See you soon,
Your foodpanda Partner Care Team
